name: Meme Break
description: Meme Break helps you take short, fun breaks during work or study. It shows you fresh memes from popular subreddits at regular intervals (15 min, 30 min, 1 hr, 2 hrs) as small retro-style popups in your browser tabs. Easily toggle meme breaks on/off and customize the interval to fit your schedule. Stay productive while keeping your mood light and refreshed!
